buildCommand: rm -rf pages/auth src/app/api src/app/calendar src/app/page.tsx src/app/sign-in src/app/sign-up && mkdir -p shared-components && mkdir -p pages/calendar/components && echo 'export const EventModal = ({ event, onClose }) => null;' > shared-components/event-modal.js && echo 'export { EventModal } from "../../../shared-components/event-modal";' > pages/calendar/components/event-modal.tsx && next build --no-lint
installCommand: npm i --no-audit --no-fund --legacy-peer-deps && node install-deps.js && node prisma/migrate-and-seed.js
